title: Batman Arkham Lockdown
description:
The inmates have escaped and Batman has his hands full defeating an army of henchmen and some of his most iconic villains. Scour the rooftops and the seedy underbelly of Gotham City through a series of one-on-one battles with the Joker, Two-Face and more, as well as the Batman: Arkham City Lockdown exclusive ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ Deathstroke.
